items.sentence: Tom hopes that he doesn't flunk out of school.
Tom didn't know Mary wouldn't be at his party.
We could build several houses with this money.
Tom learned to ride a bicycle three years ago.
Tom used the same towel for ten days straight.
She's sitting in the kitchen and drinking tea.
She's very ill and has been in bed for a week.
She's very susceptible to hypnotic suggestion.
Tom is going to do his homework before dinner.
Tom has gone camping with some of his friends.
I think that would be the logical thing to do.
Tom isn't very good at speaking French, is he?
Tom is the one who wakes me up in the morning.
Tom had never had a serious girlfriend before.
Mary had never had a serious boyfriend before.
The cat rubbed against my leg, purring softly.
Tom's girlfriend is younger than his daughter.
The Berlin Wall divided Berlin into two parts.
Can't you understand that Tom needs some rest?
Can I make an appointment for a haircut today?
